alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 10:44AM CST until December 14 at 11:15AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Iberia Parish in south central Louisiana... East central Vermilion Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 1115 AM CST. * At 1044 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Intracoastal City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Henry around 1055 AM CST. Avery Island, Erath and Delcambre around 1105 AM CST. Jefferson Island around 1110 AM CST. New Iberia, Acadiana Regional Airport, Lydia and Coteau around 1115 AM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
